answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hello, to any readers of this question thread there is some information on electronic signatures that you might find helpful which came as a result of this question:
Tallahassee, FL - Digital Signature Certificate Authorities
https://www.talgov.com/growth/growth-certauthorities.aspx 
Albuquerque, NM - E-Mail Encryption/Digital Signature Policy
http://mesa.cabq.gov/policy.nsf/afd45bea1bbf393187256c8a006cf29a/4d4d4667d0a7953a87256e7b004f6720?OpenDocument 
CA Secretary of State
http://www.sos.ca.gov/digsig/digital-signature-faq.htm 
Search Warrants With E-Signatures Come to California
http://www.govtech.com/public-safety/Search-Warrants-With-E-Signatures-Come-to-California.html 
Electronic and Digital Signatures
http://www.in.gov/sboa/3232.htm

author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member in interested in receiving your policies re: electronic signatures.  Please forward to me at pmuse@transformgov.org
Thank you!
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
pmuse@transformgov.org
888-468-6450
title: Electronic Signatures
